scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: bun --filter=client run test:unit && bun --filter=server run test
scripts.build: bun --filter=client run build && bun --filter=server run build
scripts.render:build: bun install && bun --filter=@packages/core run generate && bun --filter=server run render:build
scripts.render:start: bun --filter=@packages/core run render:start && bun --filter=server run render:start
scripts.type-check: bun --filter=client run type-check && bun --filter=server run type-check
